author: Special Correspondent
text:
At a time when “a syndicate raj” is threatening to mar the Mamata Banerjee government’s efforts to woo capital to the State, Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on Wednesday sent out a clear message that such “misdemeanour” will not be tolerated.

Launching one of the most significant industrial investments in the State in recent times at Salboni in Paschim Medinipur, she said: “Please ensure the cement project’s smooth implementation,” exhorting the administration to take all steps necessary to help the project.

“Please harass them [the company] for contracts...I do no want to hear such complaints at all,” she said.
title: ‘Ensure smooth implementation of projects’
